ygData.subject: Re: [EQ Monks] An idea for the slow day
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, there is a claw fisted sort of weapon, looks like a plate glove with 3 or 4 blades coming out of it.  But its a 1 hand slashing weapon.  Really
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, there is a claw fisted sort of weapon, looks like a plate
glove with 3 or 4 blades coming out of it. But its a 1 hand slashing
weapon. Really expensive, I think.... But still, something like that that
had charges of poison or some other spell that could be refilled with a
special item would be really interesting.. (For instance, serum of slowness,
that would DOT and slow the creature down, and would require some item
gained off a creature to replenish.) Monks are indefinitely cool, but we
could all use a refreshing new addition. Maybe a cool graphic for our
sashes/headbands would be good too..... And a manuever that tosses your
enemy back would be good for feigning. Nail em away then walk off a few
steps and feign. You could get it at 15 or something and the distance you
throw the enemy could be skill based... And quite considerable at high
levels. =)

Also.... Is there anyone out there who plays Xegony who is absolutely
swamped with spare platinum and has nothing to do with it? I need armor so
badly... things that con white to me may as well con red..


Darkanano, 8th circle monk, Newbie Of Eternity, of Xegony.....
